short_summary: Supply and delivery of five Radio Frequency (RF) Test kits
description: The procurement is for Radio Frequency (RF) Test Kits for identification of faulty antennas, cables, and connectors. All the deliverables must be received on or before 31 July 2023.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Radio Frequency Test Kits**
==============================

**Reference Number:** WS3838066648

**Publication Date:** 2023-01-30

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-02-28T14:00:00 (Extended to 2 PM EST)

**Amendment Number:** 1

**Category:** Goods and Services - Competitive

**Title:** Radio Frequency Test Kits

**UNSPSC Code:** *Radio frequency identification devices*

**Summary:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a supplier to provide and deliver five Radio Frequency (RF) Test kits that will be used for power measurements to identify faulty antennas, cables, and connectors in a field environment. The delivery of all deliverables is required on or before 31 July 2023.

**Same-day Submissions Required:**

Please note that all required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on 2023-02-28 before 2PM EST. Any bids submitted after 2 PM EST will be declared non-responsive.

**Specifications:**

* UNSPSC Code: *Radio frequency identification devices*
* Quantity: Five Radio Frequency (RF) Test kits
* Delivery Address: Department of National Defence
* Dedicated Location: Ottawa, Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* NGBS Order Statement: #10

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
* City: Gatineau
* Province: Quebec
* Postal Code: K1A0S5
* Country: Canada

**Technical Contact:**

* Nimuan, Kathleen
* Email: [kathleen.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kathleen.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 
* Fax: 

**Bid Documents:**

* Ariba Discovery: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15265786?extsite=MTUyNjU3ODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Note:** Trades agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies.

Word Count: 365
